Text:
Great Manga Dude.
I've been looking fo this. I've downloaded it and am now seeding. Gonna help you seed.

Thanks.

Woah! Just finished reading.

The ending is such a cliffhanger. Are you sure you didn't leave any issues out?

Anyway, when are the next parts coming out?

Still seeding them by the way.

I am not sure when I am going to make new series.  I don't really have the time to either seed, nor get new manga, so for now, it will probably be staying as it is now.

Dragonlight

Been looking for this for a very long time :) Would appreciate if anyone with the file could seed for me please. Will then seed for others once i have 100%
Thanks! xx

And to stealth patch. It's the general ending, them rushing off to save Hao. I suggest you read Shaman King Kanzenban, which if i remember correctly, gives you the full ending ^^ xx
Great speed guys, thanks :D Gonna make a new torrent with the same files, including the missing final 14 chapters :) xx
